description.firstPart: I am a young and ambitious
description.secondPart: My goal is to create impressive and innovative web applications.

aboutPart.name: Roman Nesterchuk
aboutPart.description: My name is Roman, I am a young and ambitious Frontend developer with a great desire to create modern and innovative websites. During my training, I gained knowledge of technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Typescript and React, as well as an understanding of the fundamental concepts of front-end development. Through the projects I implemented during my studies, I learned how to solve real-world technical problems. I also gained experience working with various technologies and practiced project development from start to finish. I am ready to be part of your team and bring my energy and skills. My goal is not only to meet the needs of the modern user, but also to improve the level of user experience and participate in the creation of quality web applications.

text.body: 1.1 Welcome to our website <path>! We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting the personal information you provide through our site. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.
2.1 Personal Data: When you register on our site, subscribe to our newsletter, or fill out forms, we may collect your name, email address, phone number, and other contact information.
2.2 Automatically Collected Information: We may collect information about your use of our site, including your IP address, browser type, browser language, access times, and referring URLs.
3.2 Personalizing your experience on our site.
3.3 Providing you with information about our products and services.
3.4 Improving our site based on your feedback.
4.1 We employ all possible measures to protect your personal information to ensure its security and confidentiality.

description.title: 5. Disclosure of Information to Third Parties

text.body: 5.1 We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except trusted partners who assist us in managing our website or servicing you, provided that these parties agree to keep this information confidential.
6.1 Our website may use cookies to improve site functionality and gather information about visitors. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.
7.1 Sometimes our website may contain links to third-party sites. These third-party sites have their own privacy policies, and we are not responsible for their content or activities.
8.1 We may update this privacy policy from time to time. All changes will be posted on this page.
